UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Collagen tethering of synthetic human antimicrobial peptides cathelicidin LL37 and its effects on antimicrobial activity and cytotoxicity.
Literature.Author: Lozeau LD, Grosha J, Kole D, Prifti F, Dominko T, Camesano TA, Rolle MW

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli HB101(MIC=0.67±0.20µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=1.15±0.10µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 29260(MIC=0.49±0.06µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 49461(MIC=0.53±0.22µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 48366(MIC=0.64±0.27µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=8.13±0.68µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=8.33±0.83µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=2.25±0.49µM)
